item.title: PowerDNS DNSdist: echo capability of ip address from domain name for development
item.description: A DNSdist configuration example to map any IP address to a hostname for development purpose. The following formats are supported: 10.0.0.1.local.dev will return A record as A 10.0.0.1 192-168-1-250.local.dev will return A record as A 192.168.1.250 app.10.8.0.1.local.dev will return A record as A 10.8.0.1 app-116-203-255-68.local.dev will return A record as A 116.203.255.68 customer1.app.10.0.0.1.local.dev will return A record as A 10.0.0.1 customer-app1-127-0-0-1.local.dev will return A record as A 127.0.0.1 0a000803.local.dev will return A record as A 10.
